All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnInfoWindowClickListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnMarkerClickListener
public class Fragment_Main
extends Fragment
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnMarkerClickListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnInfoWindowClickListener

Main Fragment that contains a map showing all issues

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).
